articles.title: University Of Warwick Experts Show Small Stars May Host Bigger Planets Than Previously Thought - India Education Diary
articles.description: Stars with less than half the mass of our Sun are able to host giant Jupiter-style planets, in conflict with the most widely accepted theory of how such planets form, according to a new study led by UCL and University of Warwick researchers.Gas giant
